news.title: Minister demands overhaul of UK’s leading AI institute
news.summary: Technology secretary calls for overhaul of UK's leading artificial intelligence institute. Peter Kyle calls for switch in focus to defence and national security. Calls for leadership changes at Alan Turing Institute.

news.title: Wimbledon chiefs defend AI use as Jack Draper says line calls not ‘100% accurate’
news.summary: British No 1 says ousting of human line judges ‘a shame’ after crashing out to former finalist Marin Cilic. Wimbledon bosses have defended the use of AI line judges after Jack Draper said the technology was not ‘100% accurate’

news.title: Text therapy: study finds couples who use emojis in text messages feel closer
news.summary: Using emojis in text messages enhances connection and fun in close personal relationships, US study finds. Study published in the journal Plos One found people feel closer and more satisfied in their personal lives.

news.title: ‘Close to perfect’: readers’ favourite games of 2025 so far
news.summary: Enshrouded is a beautiful combination of Minecraft, Skyrim and resource gathering. My daughter told me I would love it and I ignored her for too long. It sometimes makes me feel like an elite fighter, then other times kicks my arse in precisely the right measures.
